info.title: Adventure Bucket List API
info.description: Adventure Bucket List provides developers with a simple and powerful REST API to integrate your applications with our Activities Marketplace, enabling you to display activity information and availability in real time and create bookings.

get.description: Returns current logged in users data
get.x-summary: Return all relevant user details as a single object

parameters.name: X-ABL-ACCESS-KEY
parameters.description: Should contain merchant ID obtained from get code section of the Dashboard.

get.description: Returns a list of valid activities for the current operator
Returns a list of active timeslots for the activity

parameters.name: activity

parameters.name: eventInstanceId
parameters.description:
combo of event id and start date of the event in the format `eventId_YYYYMMDDTHHmmssZ`
eventId can be obtained from the timeslot object.

PricingQuoteRequest.description: Simulate a booking to get the expected pricing before the actual booking

agentCode.description: Applicable if the booking should be associated with an agent. The agent will have commission based on the settings in the dashboard. This is the alphanumeric code associated with the agent, not the objectId.

timeslotId.description: timeslotId for which the booking is to be simulated. This along with the `startTime` will determine the eventInstanceId for any requests that requires a specific event.

startTime.description: Start time of the evenet for which the booking is to be simulated.

Currency.description: Currency in the alphabetic code e.g., "USD", "CAD" etc.,

activity.description: Associated activity for the requested event

timeslot.description: Associated timeslot for the requested event

agentCode.description: Applicable if the booking should be associated with an agent. The agent will have commission based on the settings in the dashboard. This is the alphanumeric code associated with the agent, not the objectId.

timeslotId.description: timeslotId for which the booking is to be simulated. This along with the `startTime` will determine the eventInstanceId for any requests that requires a specific event.

startTime.description: Start time of the evenet for which the booking is to be simulated.

paymentMethod.description: Only "credit" is available for public API

coupon.description: Details of the coupon applied to the simulated booking
